website_summaries.verdict: You'll love these Clarks for dressy occasions, but  they come with some quality concerns and aren't the best pick for everyday wear.
pros: These shoes' sleek, black leather, lace-up design and Tilden caps make them perfect for formal occasions, while the Ortholite insoles provide comfortable wear
cons: Though size discrepancies are rare, some owners found them too wide, while others thought they fit somewhat narrow
May wear out quickly if worn frequently

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is fantastic for every day business attire. It is very comfortable (Clarks always are) and looks great with a suit! I saw this same pair at the Clarks outlet and it retails for $90 so this is a great deal. I bought the black leather first and loved them so much I bought the brown leather too. For this style of shoe and level of comfort, you can't beat the price point!
customer_reviews.author: Hotelier

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase. These are comfortable right out of the box and seem well made.
customer_reviews.author: BJB

customer_reviews.title: Size 15 fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: These were as expected. I wear a size 15, so it’s hard to find shoes...these fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Gym Loomis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dress shoes
customer_reviews.text: I no longer have to wear suits and ties to work. But, occasionally I have to suit up for some special event. Ergo I have to flip off the sandals or yank off the boots and wear gentleman shoes again. I've had Clarks several times before and was not hesitant to buy these. Just know, buy your true size. The Tilden has a long toe, sort of Italian style. They may look a little long but the fit and walking flex are correct. At least for me. The quality is there. The fit and finish is there. These are very likable shoes.
customer_reviews.author: DocHolliday

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe on the market
customer_reviews.text: Once again, Clarks shoes prove why I love this company. Fit was perfect and as expected compared to other shoes. One word of caution, if you're used to the larger toe box of most Clarks, this shoe runs a bit more narrow. Still extremely comfortable. I'm on my feet on hard surfaces 12 hours a day and walk 5-7 miles during the course of an average day. These shoes have held up extremely well and never leave my feet hurting. And all for a great price (even though you can't put a price on comfort). Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Trish V

customer_reviews.title: Worst Shoes Ever.
customer_reviews.text: These have to be the most uncomfortable shoes I've ever worn. The toe box is small and cut at a weird angle that forces your toes together. I thought maybe they just needed to be broken in but after a week nothing had changed. I bought these to replace the discontinued Bostonian Bardwell Limit (which I loved) and they are nowhere near as comfortable. Needless to say, I will be replacing these Clarks with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Matt K.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy
customer_reviews.text: On a comfort scale of 1-10, where a gym shoe is a 10, a pair of Sandro Moscoloni dress shoes are a 9, and a typical dress shoe is maybe a 4, I would rate this shoe a 7.5. Comfortable out of the box with very little break in period. I have a pair of Sandro Moscoloni's, which I think are the most comfortable dress shoes in the world, and these aren't far from that. If you want that comfort or close to it, without the price tag, I'd recommend these Clarks. Very comfortable, and a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Nicolini

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky.......but read on.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking shoe. very comfortable. very attractive price. I bought two pairs (brown and black). just one thing.... SO DAMN SQUEAKY! I've tried all the remedies and none work! I emailed Clarks with no response. I just don't know what to do....
customer_reviews.author: dubz_reasons

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They fit great and are very comfortable but the color isn’t as dark as I expected. I was looking for a dark brown not a medium brown. But they look great so I kept them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Jager

customer_reviews.title: He always says these shoes are the most comfortable shoes he owns
customer_reviews.text: My brother recently graduated from business school. While there, one of his professors told him these were the shoes to buy, because they are the new style and they look really sharp. My brother loves these shoes so much that be bought two pairs: the brown leather pair and the black leather pair. He works 10 hour days, and when he gets home, he never complains that his feet hurt. He always says these shoes are the most comfortable shoes he owns.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Kent

customer_reviews.title: Comfortably classy
customer_reviews.text: Attorney here so I wear dress shoes on a daily basis. This are super comfortable and good enough to wear in court. It has a soft back so it won't cut into your heels.
customer_reviews.author: bhunt

customer_reviews.title: absolutely NOT wide
customer_reviews.text: shoe is 1/2" narrower than other shoes of the same size (I measured). different brands may run slightly larger or smaller I understand, but why would you call a narrow shoe "wide"?. and now I have to pay to return it. they charge $6 for return.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great value - quality shoe at this price!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly, no break-in, upper and insole leathers are flawless and stitched well. Insole is not removable; I augmented the arch support with a pair of Walk Hero orthotic full-sole inserts, which I remove to air at night. I wear these daily in an office environment with some outdoor sidewalk exposure (maybe 1/2 mile per day); there is no visible wear on the sole after 2 weeks. At $55, I'll buy a second pair and rotate them; I should be able to get several years out of them. Obviously, these aren't AEs, but you're not paying AE prices, either. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: TANSTAAFL

customer_reviews.title: Great color but...
customer_reviews.text: Great color and fit, however scratches on the back side of shoes right out of the box. The box wasn’t an original Clark’s box either, but instead, an Amazon box with a note attached saying that the original was damaged. Bought brand new but they were obviously an old return.
customer_reviews.author: Mommaof5

customer_reviews.title: A great investment
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé bought me a pair of these shoes when we got together three years ago when I was working a bank job and performing as a vocalist. I needed a good pair of shoes, and these shoes turned out to be the best. They’re high quality, they last a while, and they fit like a glove. The only reason I had to buy a new pair was because the soles were worn through and the leather began to crack, but I did wear the shoes for probably about a year and a half of working and performing. The best way to generate brand loyalty is having quality products, and that’s exactly what these shoes are.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe Knott

customer_reviews.title: I like the shoe very much
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe very much. It is good craftsmanship with fine quality. However it a bit long and tight. I hard wanted to return it for 10.5W but they did not have that on Amazon. It appears that the shoe manufacturer are not adhering to size standard. I have a Stanford show that is 12W which fit nicely. I also have a docker show that is 11M that fits nicely. Clark 11M is long and narrow. I kept the shoes because if not too tight and hope it ill break in as I continue to use it
customer_reviews.author: P. Opaola

customer_reviews.title: Serious Review
customer_reviews.text: So these are very comfortable shoes especially for the price. The sole is very comfortable and the width fits perfect. The only kind of bad thing I have to say would be is that there is about a quarter inch too much space in the toe box. If you're new to these types of dress shoes, you should usually have some play towards the toe because they narrow and no play means uncomfortable toes. So with these shoes there is the normal toe box space but with a little extra. Enough to notice the space but not enough to make the shoe feel loose. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong color, fit so good I kept them!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a bargain. Order a pair of browns and received black. Quickly order a replacement, had all intentions to return the black ones until I tried them on. WOW!!! It feels as if Jesus, himself made them by hand. Great leather, very comfortable and cushy. I’m a size 9.5W, but most shoes don’t come in wide. So I ordered a 10 and they fit perfect. Not too loose and not too tight. I put a couple of scratches on em when I wore them, grabbed some leather cleaner/conditioner I use on my couches and cleaned them right off. They looked brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Great, Comfortable Dressy Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These Clarks are typical of the brand - they fit well, they are comfortable, and they are an overall joy to wear. The look is on par with most shoes of its type, but the comfort of these is far above others I have worn in the past. I appreciate the cushion feel to them and love the fact that I can get up and walk around the office without feeling like I need to either take my shoes off or wear another pair to work. Well done shoe by a great brand.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Too large/long so order smaller size
customer_reviews.text: Had to return because it was approx 2inches too long (must be due to the pointed toes style but be aware of this and order at least a size smaller than your normal one). Plus, it also came with scruffs/scratches that are too obvious to ignore. It seemed like a cool and comfy shoes though and was disappointed it did not work for my teen.
customer_reviews.author: momsahoy

customer_reviews.title: Nice and wide - Beautiful shoes- Immediate compliments
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful pair of shoes. Slipped on like a glove, no binding,pressing,no pinching. I wanted to buy another pair immediately. Just wore them for the first time 10 hour day, the heel area provides more room than I need. The heel slipped and created a blister. I will not fault the shoe, I have wide flat feet and this shoe is the first one that has fit my foot area so nicely. I will place heel grips in them and I am certain they will be the nicest pair of dress shoes I have ever owned. If the heel grips solve my problem, I will purchase additional pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hollingshead

customer_reviews.title: NOT NEW - Arrived Worn, Scuffed and Dirty - Beware - These are Used Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived used. They had clearly been worn for a day or so, then returned. There were several scuffs on the shoes, the tread had small rocks and dirt in them, and stickers on the bottom were very worn off from walking.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C.

customer_reviews.title: ... shoes fit true to size and they look exactly like their display picture (maybe even a bit better)
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit true to size and they look exactly like their display picture (maybe even a bit better)! The cushioned insoles that comes with these are also extremely comfortable, making third party insoles like Dr. Scholl's almost completely unnecessary. They also seem to be reasonably durable. I received these shoes on Sept. 23, 2017 and have been wearing them 3-4 times a week as my daily brown pair and they have yet to get any noticeable creases. That's pretty amazing considering I'm on my feet a lot and take the subway in NYC.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great shoe that is aging well
customer_reviews.text: I got a blister the first day I wore these. I switched back to some other shoe for a bit until I healed, once switching back to the Clarks, they had been worn in a bit, and didn't cause problems. After wearing them a few days, they became really comfortable. I've now been wearing them mon-fri since May, and they're really comfortable and are holding up very well. I am buying another pair of Clark Oxford's today. (A different color)
customer_reviews.author: Cory Salvesen

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Great price point and comfort. I'm almost on 6 months now and it's still holding up (I walk a lot) and will buy another once this one dies. Update: It’s been ANOTHER 6 months since I bought the last pair and typed up my review...haha. And I would have to say they stood the test of time of a lot of walking (6-10 miles per day). They look good, durable, and if you’re needing a nice looking shoe to wear and don’t mind if you scuff it or wear it out a lot...these are the ones for you! Will pick up a brown pair soon to mix it up a bit
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: horrible squeaking
customer_reviews.text: Okay appearance. I thought these were a good value. However, within 100 days of use, terrible squeaking commenced. I have only worn them in an air-conditioned workplace. I now must throw them away.
customer_reviews.author: brian s heist

customer_reviews.title: Long, Pointy, and Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Be warned, these are long somewhat pointy shoes. The pictures don't do justice to just how narrow, long, and pointy these shoes are. The foot bed at the end of the toe is narrow and serves no function other than to make the shoe long and pointy. The attached pic shows these shoes next to my old pair of standard width shoes. If you like pointy shoes, these shoes should work. They did seem to be of reasonable quality. I personally had no plans to attend a leprechaun funeral so I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Thelionator

customer_reviews.title: Great work/dress shoe for looks and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been suffering from plantar fasciitis for a year and a half now. Well I should say, I was suffering from PF. After some serious treatment and wearing these shoes (two pair-always switching out) for a few months, I can finally say my foot feels great! I’m ordering my third pair for a third day rotation. Love the fit. They can be worn with a suit or with jeans. Comfortable all day. I walk a good five miles a day for work and My feet feel great with these shoes. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing these for the past week, expecting that I needed to "Break them in" well didn't have to. They are comfortable, for my frequent traveling school. No binding nor gouging. I ordered at the size I normally wear for boots and sneakers (including wide). The only downside is that this style is slightly longer, more elongated towards the toe , just be aware... The benefit is that my toes have plenty of room, and I have modern, contemporary stylish pair of Comfortable dress shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Garnie In Texas

customer_reviews.title: rubber sole wears out very quickly
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this model several times. The comfort is great. The look is good for work. The down side is that the rubber on the out sole wears out much faster than I expected. Same thing with the second pair I have - the outer side of the heel was gone in just a few months of casual wear (not every day). I ordered the slip-on version of this one but I returned it for this reason. Another down side is that it is not breathable and my feet in socks get sweaty. I suppose this is the issue with all closed shows with no perforation or any other way of airing inside.
customer_reviews.author: FastTraffik

customer_reviews.title: The shoe runs a little large
customer_reviews.text: Usually I find shoes too small when I purchase them but the Clarks Men Tilden Cap shoe fits somewhat large. I wear size 12 for almost every show I have ever worn in my life, these shoes are about a .5" too big. I am overall very pleased with the shoe so I do not mind it that much. I just tie the shoe pretty tight and the heal doesn't move. The pictures definitely do the product justice and describe well. I am pleased with the shoe and cannot wait to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hodgson

customer_reviews.title: Pictures misleading
customer_reviews.text: Update: the picture shows how much the shoes wear down in just one day of work at a law office. They might as well be made out of clay. Doesn’t look like the picture — the dark tan is more of a very flat light brown. None of the actual subtle shading around the seams is present in the real product. I have no doubt that these are genuine, but they *look* like a knockoff of themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Insole is Thin and Uncomfortable when Standing
customer_reviews.text: The exterior of the shoe holds up well. The shoe bottom hasn't worn out after months of wearing, which I can't say for the Bostonian brand shoes I used to buy. However, the interior could be improved. The 'Ortholite Footbed' insole is only half a centimeter thick and rests on a solid, hard surface. You might not notice it if you are walking, but if you are standing still for a couple minutes, or if you use a standing desk, your heels will start to hurt. The insoles are glued down, so I had to rip them out to replace them with some Sof Sole brand insoles, effectively adding $20 to the price of these shoes to make them comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Finalblossom

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!  Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I have been real pleased with these shoes. They are good looking and durable. I ordered them in July of 2019 and am still wearing them over a year later - October 2020. I wear them daily to work, to church on Sunday and sometimes out on the town. :) They have held up well. I just noticed that the heels of each shoe have a small hole worn in them. In addition the grip on both shoes has worn smooth. I am ordering my second pair. For the price these have been a winner. All other similar priced shoes I have tried haven't lasted near as long.
customer_reviews.author: Anderson Ulerich

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this shoe! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and the first time he wore them was on the night of our red carpet event. We were on our feet for almost 10 hours with no breaks and he didn’t complain or mention his feet even once! He said they were really comfortable and needed no breaking in. They looked fantastic and fit totally as expected. He normally wears a size 13 and I bought a 13 and it fit great. Would definitely recommend and definitely buy again! So happy with this shoe!
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Good quality shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: Clarks are comfortable for walking around the office all day. The sole of the shoe doesn't have deep grooves so I imagine your pressure points will flatten them out over time. The width was a little tight on my pinky toe, but after a few days of wearing the shoe expanded and relaxed. Size was true. I added my own insole and will likely replace the laces, but otherwise I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Comfort out of the box at an amazing price
customer_reviews.text: These shoes exceeded my expectations! After visiting all of my local stores searching for a pair of shoes to wear to my wedding and being disappointed by over priced uncomfortable shoes I blindly bought these based on reviews. Straight out of the box without breaking them in I wore these for 8 hours standing, dancing, and moving around almost nonstop. The comfort and support exceeded my expectations and was a pleasant suprise.
customer_reviews.author: screenames101

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky .. Squeaky .. Squeaks
customer_reviews.text: Good looking shoe but they make a lot of noise. Keeping because they fill my cheap shoe needs for office casual and I save the good $200 ones for facade with clients. Not recommended only because of the squeak ... they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Florida

customer_reviews.title: Crazy Heel Rub
customer_reviews.text: I have had many people recommend Clarks dress shoes and thought that I would give them a try. These shoes destroyed my heels on the first day. I have never had this issue with any shoes or boots. I couldn't be more disappointed in this purchase. Whats the point to a great looking shoe if you cant walk in it after an hour. These shoes are very over priced if you can only were them once.
customer_reviews.author: Carlin A. Chesick

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, good price
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of the most comfortable dress shoes I have worn (for under $60). The toe box rubs my pinky toe uncomfortably, but once these are broken in that should not be an issue. My only other concern is that the insole is stitched to the shoe. Would like to be able to replace that after it gets worn down over time, but it is what it is. I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful shoes for my boyfriend!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely pleased with this shoe buying experience. I first ordered 11.5 size for my boyfriend because that is what he wears in tennis shoes. However, the size was too big for him. However, I returned the shoes and ordered a half size smaller (size 11). Success! They look great and feel wonderful. They are black and they are for a wedding. Great experience!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I own a Brannock foot measuring device. I know my foot size. This pair of shoes fit perfectly, and are unbelievably comfortable. Since these shoes will be worn on an occasional basis, so they should last a long time. The quality of the shoes is excellent. This will not be my last purchase from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Erlo Banfield

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and great fit
customer_reviews.text: I've never bought shoes online before so I was a little scared but these fit great and I'm really happy with them. They're longer than any shoes I've had before but after getting used to the different look, I love them. I don't even use my insoles in them because they're very comfortable - and I'm a teacher so I'm on my feet in them a LOT!
customer_reviews.author: P. Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Too long of a toe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and nice looking. As for size, I wear a 10.5 wide US, and ordered a size 10 but even that was too long.
customer_reviews.author: Kiefer

customer_reviews.title: Nice dress shoe for not many $
customer_reviews.text: I am normally a 11 wide and that is what I ordered and it fit perfectly. This is a nice dress shoe. It looks good and can be used for casual too. For $50 you can't go wrong. It doesn't look like a $150 shoe but it looks plenty good. There were no tight spots or uncomfortable areas. The shoe is soft inside and seems to hold its shape and not form a crease.
customer_reviews.author: Sjd1

customer_reviews.title: Not dark enough, but incredibly comfy.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these with hopes that they would go with a brown decaf Chino pants, but they are too light! They are labeled dark tan leather, but as you can see from the picture they are light. I ordered a pair of shoes from Target (Goodfellow & CO) and that is the darker shoe pictured alongside the Clarks. It's sad because the Clarks are clearly a much higher quality shoe, and significantly comfier.
customer_reviews.author: Mike333000

customer_reviews.title: Clark Shoes went downhill
customer_reviews.text: I expected a lot more from these shoes but was disappointed. Poor choice of materials and fit was terrible. They were not wide as I ordered. Actually hurt my foot just trying it on. Clark used to manufacture high quality shoes.
customer_reviews.author: NV Fisherman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I can usually wear 9.5 or 10s. I bought these in 10 to leave room for orthotics and they fit perfectly. The wide width is great, too. The stock inserts are not very cushy so I had to replace them with aftermarket cushions. Otherwise, the shoes look great and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Neutronmx

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable shoes especially since they offer wide sizes as well. Most comfortable affordable dress shoes that also look great! Packaging was great and everything was new. Box was tied with a plastic string to keep the box right without damaging the box which is especially great for gifting. Will definitely buy more colors when my size is available!
customer_reviews.author: Erik Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Dressy and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My Husband is so satisfied with the comfort of this shoe that I bought 2 more pairs, different colors. The toe box looks like it extends longer that his Bostonians but this did not affect the fit. The size was true to fit and his inserts, to avoid Plantars Fascitis, fit in the shoes as well. The only reason for the 4 star rating is that the soles of the shoes are not leather and so cannot be resoled.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and classic dress shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these exact shoes. I loved my first pair and they lasted 2 years of 3-4 day per week use in my office job. Giving four stars for a couple reason: 1) While still comfortable, this pair came with a much more stiff feel that required a longer break in period 2) the quality of Clark’s appears to be diminishing as this second pair is already showing signs of deterioration after a couple months of regular wear.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastion

customer_reviews.title: Unusual Fit for me.
customer_reviews.text: PROs Easy return for wrong size. Nice style. Stretch feature to allow easy on and off. Nice interior padding. CONs I am a very solid size 10 shoe. This one required downsize to 9.5. Then the fit was then correct. I would have liked leather sole or heel. These are all soft plastic heel and sole. (helps with comfort) I WOULD BUY THEM AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: Zam Bigger

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and dependable pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my pair of shoes. They're comfortable, reliable and fit me snugly. I did have to return a pair in my usual size, and get half a size down, but I'm glad I did. Like all good shoes, the pair I own seems to be getting more comfortable each time I wear it. I now understand why Clark's is considered such a reputable brand, and would be my preferred brand for formal shoes in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes! Pics of 2 years 5 months of wear
customer_reviews.text: Best dress shoes I have owned. These pics are 2 years and 5 months of wear. Time to get new ones as these have lost their shine. But I am still going to wear them when I don't need to look formal or it rains. They last, they look great, and they are super comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I have used Clark's for many years and something gone wrong with the company. The products are not what they used to be. Had to return
customer_reviews.author: Jhunji

customer_reviews.title: GREAT shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband needed new shoes to wear with his suits and tuxedo for going to Masonic Lodge meetings. His shoes were 40 years old and hardly worn, but after spending $1000 on new suits for him, we had to buy new shoes! These fit perfectly .... he doesn't complain about having sore feet after attending the 2-1/2 hour lodge meetings. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Debi Pride

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and fashion for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes as the last minute addition to a suit because I realized my old dress shoes were falling apart. I didn't want to have to spend a couple hundred bucks on shoes and after reading the reviews and the price on these, I ordered them. Could not have made a better choice. These shoes look great, fit great, and more importantly they are COMFORTABLE. You actually WANT to wear them more, not less. Important if you're gonna be on your feet all day. Buy these, you won't regret it
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Stevic

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes But...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes as I was in need of a new pair of dress shoes for work. They are quite comfortable for dress shoes. The main issue I had is that they came scuffed already. It's so easy to see on brown shoes. They looked slightly damaged. I ended up keeping them instead of returning them because I figured I would have probably done the same to them after wearing them a time or two. I do recommend these shoes though but you do lose a star because they seem quite easy to scuff.
customer_reviews.author: Josh R.

customer_reviews.title: Sizing true to size, very comfy, great quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes so freaking much. My feet never hurt wearing these. The quality is amazing, which is as expected because these are Clarks. For sizing reference, I usually wear a size 10 in every shoe, so a size 10 was perfect for me. Just buy them, you won't regret them. They're amazing, stylish, and very, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ninos

customer_reviews.title: No More Bruises
customer_reviews.text: I used to wear a pair of Kenneth Cole shoes and not once did I not get bruises on the back of my ankle. They were super uncomfortable and would scratch the back of my ankle. I bought these shoes to replace that and these shoes are super comfortable to be in and they have padding on the back so I never got bruises from wearing them!
customer_reviews.author: welp

customer_reviews.title: Best available shoes for the money
customer_reviews.text: These are the best shoes of this style you can get for the price. The upper is soft and they were comfortable on first wear. If I had to complain about anything it would be that the sole is very soft. I will probably wear through these in less than a year. Since the sole is all glued and molded on the bottom there is no repairing them, just toss and buy a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Clarks are hands down the most comfortable dress shoe made
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Clarks dress shoes to work for the last 8 years and they make the most comfortable dress shoes I've ever had on my feet. All of my previous Clarks were in the Unstructured line, so I was a bit nervous about going outside of that. But there was no need to be nervous. These shoes feel like slippers instead of dress shoes, just like all of the Clarks dress shoes I've owned. I am glad I discovered this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Bluto Blutarski

customer_reviews.title: Quality dress shoe.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair. I loved the first pair so much that I had to get another one. The first pair lasted 3 years with me wearing it to work all year. To be honest, I can still wear my first pair.. I just need a new lace. I was so pleased with the show that I needed to get another pair and I got two pairs. I highly recommend this dress show for its reliability, comfort, quality and design.
customer_reviews.author: Hutchy

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well so far for those long hours on my feet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because I'd be doing innkeeper work, on my feet for as much as 16 hours in a day. Others' reviews of these shoes indicated they would do well for long hours on the feet. I've used them for three weeks solid, and while my feet are a bit sore at the end of the day, it's only because I've been on my feet so long. I'm confident that with a cheap bargain-bin shoe my feet would be aching much more, so in that regard, these shoes seem to be doing what they should. Now will they hold up to several months of such use? To be determined...
customer_reviews.author: S. E. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: This shoe is not as advertise very cheap dull looking
customer_reviews.text: The problem is it looked shiny online now I order it the color is pale dull absolutely no shine it a rip off how these people sell they product on Amazon like people is cave men I want a Better shoe for my money send my not back this is a disgrace
customer_reviews.author: Ron4U

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, but easily scuffed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and they are great, but the scuff super easily, so I'm going to have to buy some shoe polish and see if they buff out fairly easily. They look great and fit him great though! After 2 wears they were pretty covered in scuffs.
customer_reviews.author: Cbgb1404

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to wear even when you have blisters from the other guys!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried two pairs of johnson and murphy shoes. They both caused me horrible blisters on my heels. This pair of shoes not only were I able to wear them after getting those blisters, but were incredibly comfortable to walk around in. They have a classic look, are reasonably priced, and are comfortable. Everything I look for in a dress shoe. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy F

customer_reviews.title: A good shoe
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with the shoe overall, the only downside to it was the fact of its base being of rubber. The rubber rubs of on the floor and makes a weird squeaky sound which is not pleasant to ear. I think a use of better material could solve the issue. The fit was great, it’s soft on the foot which makes it very comfortable. Overall a good shoe that needs some improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Sherzod Shokirjonov

customer_reviews.title: Scratches and marker smudges
customer_reviews.text: The shoes came with scratches and what looked like permanent marker smudges on them. Asking for an exchange for a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: So nice, brought them twice
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. The soles wear out after 6-8 months.... admittedly I wear them almost everyday for work each day. The are a little tight on day one but after a break in, they become very comfortable. Liked the shoe so much that when it was time for a new pair, I purchased them again.
customer_reviews.author: Commando4

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dress shoe and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes. Classic neat design dress shoe. The leather is semi soft so it retains its original shape much longer than those softer leather shoes. Have been buying this particular style over a few years now and very satisfied. Has also nice didn't cushioning for the bottom of your foot. My size was a little tight on the width as I usually wear wide.
customer_reviews.author: Jor El

customer_reviews.title: Too Long
customer_reviews.text: I have to wonder about the sizing of the shoe. The arch support is where it is supposed to be but the shoe extends out well beyond the toes. That leaves me wondering what the fit would be like if I ordered a size smaller. Otherwise the shoe looks fine. Comfort is ok. The cushioning is not even throughout the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: No more concerns about buying shoes on line
customer_reviews.text: I have put off buying shoes on line due to concerns about finding shoes that fit and are comfortable. Traveling to town from my rural home is always so time consuming and difficult, especially when even in a larger town the shoe selection is limited for those of us with short fat feet. I finally purchased my first pair in line and they fit exactly as expected. I had a much better selection than I have ever had and they came without loosing a day to drive into the city.
customer_reviews.author: Jo D

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, true to size. I'm size 15 and they fit well
customer_reviews.text: Fit well and are comfortable. Room for Arch support after removing inner liner. I have skinny size 15 feet, where i tie the laces it sometimes bunches the leather a bit because of my more skinny feet but not terrible. Leather also shows scuffs and water drops very easily. Slightly thin leather but much better than Amazon bargain brands
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable dress shoe I’ve ever worn. First pair of Clark’s & I really like them. They’re well built & look better than shoes that cost me double what I paid for these. I spent about 9 hours in these shoes, mostly standing & walking. I didn’t feel fatigued at all.
customer_reviews.author: Zach S.

customer_reviews.title: A great pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this shoe almost every weekday for the 15 months and they have held very well. The heel of the shoe does not wear down as fast as some others in this category. Usually I would have to had changed out the shoes because of worn heels but not this shoe. The leather uppers have held up well win an office environment with chair legs getting the way too often. :)
customer_reviews.author: JohnB

customer_reviews.title: Look Great!
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected and look great. Wrote comfortable for the price point. I rarely wear them as they are on standby for when I have to wear a suit which is rare. So I can’t say how long they would last some one who wore them daily but they’ll last me basically forever.
customer_reviews.author: Carnivore316

customer_reviews.title: Much better than dockers for work
customer_reviews.text: I used to wear dockers shoes to work but these are my new go to. The stretchy section on the side of the tongue makes the shoe so comfortable and they also look much better. Will not go back
customer_reviews.author: henry maple

customer_reviews.title: Never bought nice shoes online. These were worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I needed shoes last minute for a wedding. I was contracting in remote Nevada and couldn't just stop by a store. I took a leap of faith on these and was rewarded. I've literally walked miles in these shoes and they're still cushiony and offer good support. Great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Escamilla

customer_reviews.title: I love Clarks, I own the black pair and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I love Clarks, I own the black pair and I have been looking for a brown shoe and found these on sale and they are an excellent shoe. My feet are very comfortable and I can walk all day around the office or the office complex without my feet hurting. Excellent choice to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kris C

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I saw these dress shoes at a local Ross but they didn’t have his size. I found it on amazon and the ones that we ordered fit him perfectly. He says they are SO comfortable compared to any other dress shoes he’s had. There’s cushion padding on the inside for comfort and support. They are very nice looking shoes! I might get him the black ones as well.
customer_reviews.author: Helgacakes

customer_reviews.title: They hold up really well and are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I walk a lot at work, 5-10 miles a day and these have held up better than literally anything so far. I’m actually buying them again and I never do that. I’m always on the hunt for something better, but I don’t think I have to look anymore! And the price is also a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM I.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: We needed new dress shoes for my husband and son quickly for an unexpected funeral, during this pandemic. These shipped quickly, look great, and both guys, one a size 11 and one 15 remarked how comfortable they are.. (that 8is unusual) Fantastic price, great save.. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: They hurt my feet when tied tightly at first. Loosened them up a bit and they got broken in after a week or two, now they're pretty nice. Definitely going to stick with something like this at this price point after my old $300 Eccos wore out after four or five years. We'll see how long these last but I have a feeling the total cost will be less.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Ok shoe with cheap shoelaces
customer_reviews.text: Shoe ok but shoelaces broke after only two months. Customer service very poor and told me to just buy new shoelaces.
customer_reviews.author: gkjake

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected, very nice appearance overall.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with the overall appearance of the shoe. The inside is very comfortable. I come from using Bates shoes, this is more confortable than the High Gloss model. I used the Bates Shoe size for reference and it fit as expected. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Roberto Ruiz Garcia Salas

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I wore them for several hours one day and they were very comfy. I was very impressed with the material used, the look of them, along with the level of comfort. I will definitely be suggesting these to others and be buying another pair in black.
customer_reviews.author: Deary

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.text: They'll take a little while to break in, but full grain leather does it surprisingly quickly. Came ready to go right out of the box, and after I get used to them(my previous pair of black dress shoes were Clarks but a different style) I'll have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable pair of dress shoes I've purchased. First time buying Clark's, I love everything from the leather finish, the soft inserts, and the stretch fabric built into the shoe near the tongue to make putting on and taking off so much easier. I also like the rubber grip on the shoe bottom, I much prefer that over the slippery smooth finish I've experienced on previous dress shoes.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty excited to get a nice pair of dress shoes for $50. The company also shipped 2nd day air which was a nice surprise. They look great with a suit and are very comfortable so far. I hope they last a while. Very good deal overall.
customer_reviews.author: Duke12687

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality at an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: I needed a replacement rubber-soled dress shoe since the Rockports I had been wearing were only lasting 8 months and at $100 per pair repurchasing them did not make sense. These are much higher quality at half the price. I'll report how long they last, but so far, they are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive about buying a show through Amazon but I am glad I did. These are very comfortable, look great and seem like they'll hold up. I usually go with cheap-o dress shoes at around $30 buy I'm glad I paid a bit more for these.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brandon Felts

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing this shoes now for a week and I’d say, good so far. It’s comfort level on the inside is fairly good, but I hope the manufacturers would put more padding in the arc support. It fits just just as I expected, but a bit tight across. However, I do believe that with time it will stretch to fit sufficiently. Overall I’m loving it and plan on getting another colour soon.
customer_reviews.author: Uriel Williams, Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Size Seems Off
customer_reviews.text: The shoes looked great and it slipped on well enough. The only problem that i had was the size. I ordered an 8W US. These shoes seemed more like a 9 or 9.5 US. I'm not sure why, as the label indicated 8W. I've included a picture for reference of another shoe that is 8W US (black color) next to this shoe (burgundy color). Everything else seemed to be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Willy

customer_reviews.title: A wee bit big/ smaller size ordered
customer_reviews.text: Our son wears a size 15 in athletic shoes. However the 14's we ordered were too large. We were very pleased as now we have a shoe that we can order. We returned the size 14's and ordered a 13 which fits well. Lovely shoes, high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: husband loves them
customer_reviews.text: We bought a pair at Nordstrom rack and he asked me to go online and find a second pair because he loves them that much! He says they are very comfortable. He is super picky when it comes to shoes and will spend up to $150 for good paid of dress shoes so these are a steal!
customer_reviews.author: BlondyInTexas

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly built shoe with the comfort of a cloud holy moly
customer_reviews.text: Okay, LOVE this shoe!! Quality built shoe with so much comfort. The color I got was a little bit more bleak than the photo showed (it was one of the tans), but I got used to it! The shoe fits perfectly and so far has lasted well. Great job Clarks! Don't change
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Sizing not as expected
customer_reviews.text: I never had this happen before: The right shoe feels half a size smaller than the left even though it's labeled correctly. It squishes my toes but only when I walk. I'm hoping it will stretch and break in nicely. If the shoe feels better soon, I'll update this post. Other than the comfort issue, they are very nice looking shoes. Update 7/23/2017 - The right shoe is still too tight in the front. I won't be buying shoes online again.
customer_reviews.author: Madmartigan

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shows I own
customer_reviews.text: I have a love/hate relationship with Clarks . . . on one hand, they're not the best looking or best constructed shoes out there. On the other, they are outrageously comfortable and relatively affordable. I'd rather be comfortable, so these are my go-to business casual work shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Likes: Exactly like product at store Very clean Comfortable for all day wear Fits true to size Great quality Dislikes: The box was beat up, couldn’t give as a gift in the box it came in
customer_reviews.author: Michella Saad

product_meta.title: Clarks Men's Tilden Cap Oxford Shoe
product_meta.description:
A classic captoe derby crafted from rich, full grain leather. The Tilden Cap by Clarks Collection features discreet elastic gore panels for an easier fit without distracting from its elevated profile. Inside, an impact-absorbing OrthoLite footbed reduces the shock of every step, while the flexible TPR outsole provides lightweight grip

Clarks has been in business for over 100 years making very fine men's dress shoes in a variety of styles. Featuring a wide range of top-quality components, Clarks gives you the options you desire in the quality you demand. Trims- Buckle. Medium width
feature_bullets: Comfort Features: Ortholite Footbed, Smooth Fabric and PU Linings, Durable TPR Outsole
Stretch Gore Panels for a Flexible Fit
